title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.50 - Chain organization
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.50 - Chain organization

State Regulations
A health care or other organization consisting of a group
of two or more facilities which are owned, leased or, through any other device, controlled by one business entity. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.50

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
